message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor since I lose more value (20%) than you (10%) each round. This is fair and gives us both a good outcome.
Alice, let's be fair. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. We both lose value, but this gives us a more equitable distribution considering we are only in round 2.

Bob, let's find middle ground. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. This accounts for my higher inflation rate (20% vs your 10%) while being more balanced than my first offer. Let's settle this before we both lose more value.
